评论详情: Weweya adjustable tongue Gray and red shoe. I purchased this shoe style 3 times, but in different colors and at different times within the past 8 months. The first pair were perfect. Each pair after that were slightly shorter and the toe box was narrower. I don't like making numerous returns, but the quality control in their sizes seems to be lacking. I absolutely love the first pair. I just wish I could purchase additional pairs that fit the same.

I can really feel the clutch in my Miata. They are super comfortable for pedal feel in general and only ever really wear them when I drive my Miata. These do hurt my feet after standing for a while but that could just be me. They’re very flexible, very breathable and have decent traction.  They don’t look the best to me but it doesn’t really bother me.
Love these shoes and wear them everyday and the only shoes I have had that I didn’t want to kick off as soon as I got home.

评论概述: Great, well-made shoe. The best minimalist shoe I have ever owned. Fair value
评论详情: I walk 2 - 3 miles per day, 6 days a week on an indoor track, these shoes will allow the user to really feel the road so to speak. You will get complete flexibility, and the zero-heel drop will allow your heel to engage the surface first... as nature intended. I own 2 pairs one pair has a cushion tongue and the other does not. I think the adjustable tongue pair are slightly more comfortable.

评论详情: My son wears crocs most of the year. But it is just too cold now. I wasn’t sure if the shoes would do the job but they are lightweight. I love the style. It has good cushioning.  It has great traction. He plays outside a lot.

I’ve had the Camo / khaki colored Weweya size 39 for about 3 months now.  They run true to size as I’m usually a women’s 8-8.5 US.  They’re fitted enough for my somewhat narrow heel, yet they give my wider toe section plenty of space to move, and with no heel lift they are super comfy, plus the laces & stripe styling provide some support in the arch of the foot if needed.  They’re cute when I’m feeling sporty or outdoorsy.  Soles provide grip and flexibility, They seem pretty durable so far! I think they’re my new favorite everyday casual shoe!
Great shoes! Super comfy, I’ve been wearing them daily for six months now… no issues! True to size, well worth it for the forty bucks, you can’t go wrong with.

these shoes have been great, I mostly wear them around the house and in the yard, really durable,flexible, well put together, very good traction, sizes seem to run a little big but they are still very comfortable.

My husband loves these shoes!  I was skeptical because being diabetic, the last few years he hasn’t been easy to feel comfortable wearing shoes.  His feet to swell due to lymphedema and so most of his shoes went through spells where they weren’t comfortable to wear or he just simply couldn’t get them on.  I thought they wouldn’t give him support and if he walked on gravel wouldn’t feel comfortable but he loves that his toes can spread out and he says they are comfortable, even thinking of buying him another pair!  That’s something for him!!  It’s a very good shoe!!
This pair of shoes were very easy to put on and comfortable. Delivery was on time.
The first pair came apart on the first week. The seller sent me a new pair and let me keep the damaged pair. The second pair began falling apart 6 months later. I won't buy this brand again.

After 20 years of wearing Birkenstock sandals and shoes. I did not expect to be able to wear these without making my feet hurt. But, I received these 3 days ago and haven’t taken them off. Very supportive, light and comfortable.
Ordered a half size bigger, I have wide feet. Great deal. Awesome on gravel roads.
Never thought I would like these but they are awesome.
Nice comfortable shoes and I love them for the gym.
Comfortable and roomie. True to size.

I was recently in Tokyo, and if you’ve been there then you know how much walking and stair climbing there is. My feet did not hurt once in an entire day of waking the subways and temples and shopping strips, I was good! The next day I wore my stylish New Balance and my feet hurt.

Love these things. Inexpensive but surprisingly very comfortable. I’ve worn them hiking and around town for several months now. This is my second pair and I enjoy them. Look great filbury. Well built.

I love these! I don't leave reviews, usually. I made an exception with these shoes. I have worn them everyday for two weeks, now, and they're the most comfortable shoes I've ever had. While I should have ordered them in the next ½ size up, they fit like a glove and feel great. My back doesn't hurt as bad (chronic pain), my hips and knees don't hurt, my feet feel amazing. I had gotten used to wearing shoes with flat soles (no heel height) but I needed more support for my feet. These feel like walking barefoot, but with armor protecting your soles. I, personally, like the fact that these aren't true minimalist shoes, the padding around the rest of the for is nice. They can be a little slick on wet pavement, mostly aggregate, but otherwise they're fine. My feet sweat badly so I always wear socks to keep my shoes from smelling bad. With that in mind, I haven't found any hot spots or rough places inside that weren't the result of a sock being misaligned. Suffice it to say, I get happy when I get to put my shoes on now!
Made me feel I was walking with flat feet. Not normal at all.

评论概述: Not as wide as I had hoped

These are not as wide as either of those brands, but I believe it is because these companies don't increase the width for insulated winter shoes. I had the same problem with Saguaro's winter hiking boots.

Hard to find a reasonably priced zero drop that can withstand the twisting and toe drag that happens during a disc golf throw. I was just going to live with more expensive options if this pair didn't work out.  I am nearly 10 rounds in with them. Fit is great, traction solid, no rips in the fabric or toe.  All great news. Looks like my new go to option. May have to figure out a waterproof strategy though.
In the summer I live in these shoes!!

I bought these because the last 3 pairs of minimalist shoes I've owned have disintegrated in less than 3 months. As a rule, I try not to step in puddles when wearing these. They fit great and are comfortable.

These are very comfortable and very well made so far. Will purchase again.

They're really comfortable walking in, super flexible,  smells pretty decent, the materials feel silky and rubbery  and gives me somewhat support when walking

Very surprised at the comfort of these. It took my leg muscles awhile to get used to this minimalist style but after that I love this style of shoe.  Fit was exactly as expected and so far they are holding up under a lot of use. These shoes have been worth every penny.

Not for senior citizens, the non-slip soles tend to grab when walking on carpeted floors. Nowhere near as comfortable as walking barefoot! My old sockless. shoes are still my go-to "earth pads" for walking outside the house.

We Liked the style -Impressed shoes are very nice well made and strong we don’t know much about comfort support elasticity just but what we can see -my hubby couldn’t wear them cause they are running small for that reason we are thinking about returning this pair and order another in a bigger size honestly I am not 💯 % sure what size I should order. My son ordered a pair for women for my use in my size and it worked with no issues - what should I do?

Love these shoes more than xero brand, sole has yet to come loose anywhere, mesh upper has gotten one cut but held up fine, definitely not waterproof but very breathable and perfect for exercise or excessive walking. 评论概述: Love the Shoes, Hate the Smell
评论详情: After having to air out these shoes to get rid of the glue smell, I found them to be very comfortable, with plenty of room for a wide foot with long toes. They wear very nicely, fit correctly and are securely fasten to the foot. If you have a difficult time finding shoes that don't hurt, you need these shoes. They have extra threads on the bottom on the sole to keep you steady. Don't forget to air them out for a few hours though!

I have wide feet and typically wear an 11.5. Got these in an 11 and they are perfect. 2 months in with heavy use and they're holding up great. Hiking, fishing, kayaking and everyday use. They breath quite well and to me are more comfortable then a tennis shoe.
